items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for the money
items.body: This one looks really nice and true to size. Fabric is a little thin but it is also expected due to the price. Great for this winter season! Read more
items.author: Anna gransmark

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Materials way too thin!!
items.body: Absolutely see thru!! Bought this to wear at a Christmas party. Need to find another option. I don’t want to be arrested for indecent exposure!! Read more
items.author: mc4738

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thin material
items.body: Super comfy got it in size medium Read more
items.author: Daisy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fit
items.body: I am 5’6” and 180lbs. I had gotten a large, but it was too small and short. The fit was awkward and tight in the body and loose in the arms. Read more
items.author: Ally

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: There were a couple colors I liked but in the end, I went with black. Though I looked at the size measurements, my thought process went a little bit like this..."the smallest size is small, the small is snug on the model and I want it roomy." That's literally what I thought before sizing up to medium. One thing I love is when sellers include the model's measurements because it helps. I'm going to say I made a mistake and should've ordered the small. It's very roomy but thankfully, a thick belt helps. There's no need to size up. The size chart is accurate. I know it's not often a size small has a 40" chest but this does. I'm 5'4" around 108 lbs, 34B. Waist around 27, hips around 36. The small would've still been roomy. The dress is somewhat sheer. The photos and video already showed that and I can confirm. Aside from having long sleeves, it really reminds me of a swimsuit cover probably due to how thin it is but its definitely a sweater dress. It's flattering with the shirring and it looks great with a thick belt. Overall I'm pleased and would recommend it. The current price of $26.99 is fair. Read more
items.author: Jen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Es realmente cómodo
items.author: Estela Alavez salas

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed with dress quality
items.body: Material is soo see true and thin. Disappointed of quality Read more
items.author: Bombon07

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Bodycon Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Bodycon Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Cream, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Dark Gray, Navy Blue, Wine Red, Pink, Purple, Dark Blue, Light Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
